tool_description: API providing historical list for all Stanley Cup Championships
name: NHL Stanley Cup
title: NHL Stanley Cup

api_list.name: AllStanleyCupData
api_list.description: Provides all historical data for Stanley cup competitions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nhl-stanley-cup.p.rapidapi.com/stanleyCupData"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nhl-stanley-cup.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nhl-stanley-cup.p.rapidapi.com/stanleyCupData"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nhl-stanley-cup.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
